com.seatunity.boardingpass.networkstatetracker
Class NetworkStateReceiver

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      com.seatunity.boardingpass.networkstatetracker.NetworkStateReceiver

public class NetworkStateReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver

The class extends the BroadcastReceiver & listens to the internet on-off events to perform some network operations.
